resources.string: You have not rented this locker.
To open this locker, please just tap the phone on the locker at the NFC symbol. To close the locker, just push the door closed and it will lock automatically.

To open this locker, please just tap the phone on the locker at the NFC symbol. To close the locker, wait a few seconds after opening and then just push the door closed and it will lock automatically.
To open this locker, please just tap the phone on the locker at the NFC symbol. To close the locker, please just tap again.

## SMAUG - Secure Marketplace for Access to Ubiquitous Goods\n
This is the SMAUG mobile application, intended for **demonstration purposes only**. This is not a finished application, and it is **not intended for production use**.
Please see [SMAUG repository on SOFIE project GitHub](https://github.com/SOFIE-project/) for more information related to SMAUG and the SOFIE EU project.
SMAUG has been brought to you by Antonio Antonino, Filippo Vimini, Mikko Mustonen and Santeri Paavolainen from Ericsson Finland Oy.
\n### License\n
All of SMAUG, including this mobile application, is released under [Apache License 2.0](https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0).
No lockers found, maybe a plumbing problem?
